Product Description

High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

Contrast before and after the use of the rearview mirror rain cover:

1. The vision will be better in rainy days, don’t worry about the blurred vision caused by the raindrops on the rearview mirror.

2. The rear-view mirror rain cover can reduce the glare of the rear-view mirror under the sun, making your driving safer.

3. It can also be used as a car decoration at ordinary times to make your car more sporty.

Step 1

Clean the mirrors.

Step 2

Tear off the adhesive.

Step 3

Install to target location.

Step 4

The installation is complete.

【Material】: Our car rear view mirror rain eyebrow is made of soft PVC plastic that is 100% soft and flexible. It will not break or deform easily and can meet your needs for a long time.
【Size】: The size of this rear view guard eyebrow is about 7.28*2.17in, appropriate size will prevent rain from falling on the rearview mirror without blocking your view, full protection for your rearview mirror.
【Wide Application】: The side mirror rain guard can be widely applied in most kinds of cars and vehicles, like trucks, buses, tractors, SUVs, motorcycles and so on.
【Easy to Install】: The mixed adhesive is very sticky but does not leave marks, please pay attention to clean the rearview mirror before sticking and installing it when it is dry and dust free.
【Safe Driving】: Rain and heavy snow can blur the rearview mirror and thus interfere with your driving vision. Installing rain eyebrows can effectively block the interference of rain and snow, provide a clear vision and improve the safety of driving on rainy days.

  1. High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.
  2. Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.
  3. Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.
  4. Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

From the brand

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

Accessories For Harley

Alpha Rider began designing and manufacturing Motorcycle Parts with an innovative flair in 2010.

We‘ve since grown to become one of the largest providers of Motorcycle accessories .

We ask ourselves: What would you like to do with your Motorcycle… that enhances your life?

Our approach has given birth to some of the best known accessories .

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

【Wide Application】Perfectly fit all types of vehicles. This ground strap is a good parner that connects an engine block to a framework. The rated current of this engine ground strap is 62 Amps.
【High-quality Copper Materials】 This ground strap is made of copper with a tin-plated surface to provide superior current delivery, resistance to oxidation and corrosion, as well as a long service life.
【Practical Structure】 These braided ground straps is 1/2″ wide, which provide durability, flexibility and maximum conductivity.The 5/16″ Rings Terminal makes installation a breeze.
【Package Included】3pcs 10″x 1/2″ & 2pcs 13″ x 1/2″ Professional Vehicle Grounding Cable Straps are included.Each strap is built from center to center of lugs holes.
【Great Service Support】 If you encounter any problems in the process of purchasing and using this product, please feel free to contact us. We will solve the problem for you in the first time and provide you with the best after-sales service.

Product Description

Sticky note boards

Material: acrylic

Color: Transparent

Size: 11×3.1×0.05 inch

Weight: 145g

Package includes: 4 Sticky note boards

High Quality Materials

Computer monitor message board made of clear acrylic material, stylish, durable, easy to paste, record important things and to-dos, make your life more organized and convenient.

Concise Beautiful

The computer message board is clear and transparent, simple and beautiful, keeping the desktop clean, and brings more fun to the office.

Easy To Remove

Multifunction computer monitor memo board, easy to remove, will not damage your monitor or leave unsightly marks when removed.

1.Tear off the surface protective film before use.

2.Remove the self-adhesive tape

3. Paste the memo board to the computer.

Warm Tips:

Please stick the computer memo board on the frame of your computer instead of the computer screen to avoid damaging your screen.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Monitor memo board is made of acrylic material, which is simple and stylish, light weight, easy to use, durable, not easy to fall off or break. Note: Please stick the memo message board on the computer frame instead of the computer screen to avoid damage to the screen.
PRODUCT SIZE: Computer monitors message board size is 11×3.1×0.05inch, suitable for most computer monitor. Note holder for monitor simply peels off the sticker and hang it over the edge of the monitor screen of either side to use.
HOW TO USE: You need to tears off the computer side panel memo surface protective film, wipe the dust on the edge of the computer monitor, and stick the board to the right or left side of tape, and you’re done.
EASY STORAGE: Monitor memo is easy to use, you can stick a memo on the message board to record important things and to-dos to prevent forgetting. Memo board for office easy to store, make your life more organized and more convenient to use.
WIDE APPLICATION: Computer monitor side panel is suitable for home, office, bringing convenience to your life. Multifunction computer monitor memo board to meet your daily needs in the office and at home, never forget what you want to do, and bring you a good experience.

Product Description

Why Choose KUSUFE Plastic Razor Blade Scraper?

Are you still annoying about the difficult removal of labels, decals, stickers, glue, paint, adhesive, food residue, etc.?

Are you still using your fragile nails to remove the above stains?

If so, then it is time for you to take KUSUFEFI Plastic Scrapers around your house, and you will find that your cleaning has never been so easy.

Warm Tips:

1. When you replace the blade, please note that the tips on both sides of the blade are somewhat sharp.

2. Since the plastic blade is double-sided, when one side becomes blunt, you can use the other side to continue using.

3. For some particularly stubborn stains, we recommend to use the remover and plastic scraper together to achieve the best cleaning effect.

What Will You Get?

Including 2pcs scrapers and 60pcs extra plastic double edged blades, helps you save more money.

MAKE YOU CLEAN COMFORTABLY: Our plastic blade scraper adopts an ergonomic curved handle design. The dent on the handle is specially designed for your thumb to be placed on it while working, providing you with comfortable control and saving your time and energy
SAFE CLEANING SCRAPER TOOL: Two slots on the back of the blade scraper securely hold the plastic razor blades to ensure that the blade will not slip out. The plastic blade is sharp but safe, you won’t worry about this scraper multitool cutting your fingers while working
SCRATCH FREE SCRAPER TOOL: Our plastic scraper consists of a sturdy ABS handle and plastic blade. It removes stubborn stains more easily, but it won’t scratch the surfaces like metal blades. You can use it on paint, glass, metal, wood, plastic, and tile surfaces safely
MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING SCRAPER: This sticker scraper tool is ideal for removing decals, stickers, tints, labels from windows, cars, RV, walls, tiles, floors, paint, wood, and glass. It can also remove food residues from oven, cooktop, and glass stove top
HANGING DESIGN FOR EASIER STORAGE: This plastic razor scraper tool is lightweight and portable pocket-sized, making it very easy to carry and store. What are you still hesitating? Just to equip your kitchen, garage, RV, tool bag with such an interesting scraper tool
